TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed SoapMessageStage extends System.Enum

summary.span: 指定 SOAP 消息的处理阶段。

span.span: Specifies the processing stage of a SOAP message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 提供了可扩展性机制，用于调用 Web 服务使用 SOAP。ASP.NET provides an extensibility mechanism for calling Web Services using SOAP. 可扩展性机制围绕，可以检查或修改在客户端或服务器上处理的消息中的特定阶段的一条消息。The extensibility mechanism revolves around a that can inspect or modify a message at specific stages in message processing on either the client or the server. 此枚举指定的处理阶段。This enumeration specifies the processing stage of the . 下表显示在 SOAP 客户端和服务器处理期间发生的每个阶段时。The following table shows when each stage occurs during SOAP client and server processing. |`SoapMessageStage`|期间处理During processing|期间处理During processing| |---|---|---| |`AfterDeserialize`|之后包含来自 XML Web 服务方法调用的响应的 SOAP 消息反序列化到对象，但在客户端接收的反序列化的结果之前发生。Occurs after the SOAP message containing the response from an XML Web service method invocation has been deserialized into an object, but prior to the client receiving the deserialized results.|包含表示 XML Web 服务方法调用的 SOAP 消息的网络请求反序列化为一个对象，但在该方法之前调用对象，表示 XML Web 服务方法之后发生。Occurs after a network request containing a SOAP message representing an XML Web service method invocation is deserialized into an object, but prior to the method on that object representing the XML Web service method is called.| |`AfterSerialize`|客户端调用 XML Web 服务方法和参数序列化为 XML，但在 SOAP 之前包含该 XML 消息通过网络发送后发生。Occurs after a client invokes an XML Web service method and the parameters are serialized into XML, but prior to the SOAP message containing that XML is sent over the network.|XML Web 服务方法返回，并且任何返回值序列化为 XML，但在包含该 XML 的 SOAP 消息之前通过网络发送之后发生。Occurs after an XML Web service method returns and any return values are serialized into XML, but prior to the SOAP message containing that XML is sent over the network.| |`BeforeDeserialize`|已收到来自 XML Web 服务方法调用的网络响应，但之前包含 SOAP 响应消息反序列化为一个对象后发生。Occurs after the network response from an XML Web service method invocation has been received, but just before the response containing the SOAP message is deserialized into an object.|由 Web 服务器，但在 SOAP 消息被反序列化为一个对象之前收到包含 XML Web 服务方法调用的 SOAP 消息的网络请求之后发生。Occurs after a network request containing the SOAP message for an XML Web service method invocation is received by the Web server, but prior to the SOAP message being deserialized into an object.| |`BeforeSerialize`|客户端调用 XML Web 服务方法之后, 但在正在序列化的调用之前发生。Occurs after a client invokes an XML Web service method, but prior to the invocation being serialized.|调用 XML Web 服务方法返回时，但之前的返回值进行序列化并通过网络发送回客户端之后发生。Occurs after the invocation to the XML Web service method returns, but prior to the return values being serialized and sent over the wire back to the client.| ## Examples 下面的示例是可实现的 SOAP 扩展的片段方法。The following example is a fragment of a SOAP extension, which implements the method. 内方法中，处理处理特定于。Within the method, processing of a is handled specific to the . [!code-cpp[SoapMessageState#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapMessageState/CPP/SoapMessageState.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[SoapMessageState#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapMessageState/CS/soapmessagestate.cs#1)] [!code-vb[SoapMessageState#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapMessageState/VB/soapmessagestate.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage AfterDeserialize = int32(8)

summary.span: 恰好在将 从 SOAP 消息反序列化到对象之后的阶段。

span.span: The stage just after a is deserialized from a SOAP message into an object.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage AfterSerialize = int32(2)

summary.span: 恰好在序列化 之后，但在通过网络发送 SOAP 消息之前的阶段。

span.span: The stage just after a is serialized, but before the SOAP message is sent over the wire.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage BeforeDeserialize = int32(4)

summary.span: 恰好在将 从通过网络发送的 SOAP 消息反序列化到对象之前的阶段。

span.span: The stage just before a is deserialized from the SOAP message sent across the network into an object.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage BeforeSerialize = int32(1)

summary.span: 恰好在序列化 之前的阶段。

span.span: The stage just prior to a being serialized.
